ygData.subject: RE: Voli Greenwhisper
ygData.msgSnippet: Been fixed.  The gloves are lighter, have had stat bonuses reduced and proc nothing now. Lei
ygData.messageBody:
Been fixed. The gloves are lighter, have had stat bonuses reduced and proc
nothing now.

Lei

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JnglSkyPWR@... [mailto:JnglSkyPWR@...]

> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Voli Greenwhisper
>
>
> From: JnglSkyPWR@...

> From all that I've heard, they do not spawn Grim Oakfist any

>
> Kanja
